dc_title_s: Provincia Connachtiae: The province of Connaugt; Amstelodami Excudebat Joannes Janssonius.; Provincia Connachtiae: The province of Connavgt;Province of Connacht;Province of Connaught
dc_description_s: Relief shown pictorially. Map is oriented with North to the right. Drawings of ships are in the ocean, and a sea monster. This state was published in atlases by Jan Jansson in 1636, 1637, and 1680. From the Jansson Appendix Atlas 1636-1680, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 37 x 47 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
dc_creator_sm: Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664.,Jansson, Jan, 1588-1664. Appendix Atlas.,Vignaud, Henry, 1830-1922, former owner.
